files.patch:
@@ -80,1 +80,1 @@ -

  • tier2: This test group covers even more ground. These contain, among other things, tests that either run for too long to be at tier1, or may require special configuration, or tests that are less stable, or cover the broader range of less critical JVM and JDK features/components (for example, jaxp).

    • +

  • tier2: This test group covers even more ground. These contain, among other things, tests that either run for too long to be at tier1, or may require special configuration, or tests that are less stable, or cover the broader range of non-core JVM and JDK features/components (for example, XML).

@@ -100,2 +100,2 @@
-or tests that are less stable, or cover the broader range of less critical JVM and JDK
-features/components (for example, jaxp).
+or tests that are less stable, or cover the broader range of non-core JVM and JDK features/components
+(for example, XML).
